alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 7:34PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHWESTERN AITKIN AND SOUTHEASTERN CROW WING COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 734 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Deerwood, to Garrison, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Aitkin around 745 PM CDT. Mille Lacs Lake and Malmo around 800 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Wealthwood, Cedar Lake, Farm Island Lake, Ripple Lake, Glory, Bay Lake and Glen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
